tasks.label: Run Calibration
tasks.command: cd ~/catkin_ws/ && source devel/setup.bash && source devel/setup.bash && rosrun kalibr tartan_calibrate --bag /home/container_user/workspace/calibration_data.bag --target /home/container_user/workspace/aprilgrid.yaml --topics /camera/color/image_raw --min-init-corners-autocomplete 29 --min-tag-size-autocomplete 2 --correction-threshold 10.1 --models pinhole-radtan  --dont-show-report --save_dir /home/container_user/workspace
